Class UsernameListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.usernamelist.controllers.UsernameListController

  • @Controller
public class UsernameListController
extends java.lang.Object
    Principal controller of app, manages the views and calls processing of Model layer and contains other processing methods

      • validateUsername

        public static boolean validateUsername(java.util.List<Usernames> currentUsernamesCreated,
                                       java.util.List<RestrictedWords> allRestrictedWords,
                                       java.lang.String username)
        Method to validate a given Username and if it's acording to rules, indicate with true or false if it's may be created or not in system
        Parameters:
        currentUsernamesCreated - List of usernames created
        allRestrictedWords - List of all restricted words created
        username - Username to create and validate
        Returns:
        True if Username could be created, False in other case
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of a general error in process
        Since:
        1.0
